description:
The contestants are brought to a tropical paradise and have to make a sweet bread with ingredients found on the island. Things take a turn for the worse though when Kazuma gets caught in a whirlpool! Forget about winning… can they survive?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jeu de survie ! Des boulangers sur une île déserte !
Survival!! Bakers on a Deserted Island!
เซอร์ไววัล! ช่างทำขนมปังบนเกาะร้าง
サバイバル!! 無人島のパン職人!
